problem_text:
Let G be a p-group acting transitively as a permutation group on a set Ω, let F be a field of characteristic p, and regard FΩ as an FG-module. Then do the descending and ascending Loewy series of FΩ coincide?
P. M. Neumann
answer: Yes, they do (J. L. Alperin, Quart. J. Math. Oxford (2), 39, no. 154 (1988), 129–133).
